Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
datamodel.Customer
public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
Class for entity type Customer.

Customer is an individual (a person, not a business) who creates and holds (owns) orders in the system.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT_D1"
Author:
"Khatia Zitanishvili"

      public final Customer setId​(long id) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Id setter. Id can only be set once with valid id, id is immutable after assignment.
      Parameters:
      id - value to assign if this.id attribute is still unassigned id < 0 and id argument is valid.

      chainable self-reference.

    • setName

      public Customer setName​(java.lang.String first, java.lang.String last)
      Setter that splits a single-String name (for example, "Eric Meyer") into first- ("Eric") and lastName ("Meyer") parts and assigns parts to corresponding attributes.
      Parameters:
      first - value assigned to firstName attribute, null is ignored.
      last - value assigned to lastName attribute, null is ignored.
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference.

    • setName

      Setter that splits a single-String name (e.g. "Eric Meyer") into first- and lastName parts and assigns parts to corresponding attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - single-String name to split into first- and lastName parts.
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name argument is null.

      public Customer addContact​(java.lang.String contact) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Add new contact for Customer. Only valid contacts (not null, "" or duplicates) are added.
      Parameters:
      contact - valid contact(not null or "" nor duplicate), invalid contacts are ignored
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
